headline: SAE ITC EVPKI Consortium™ Launches Production Certificate Trust List (CTL)
summary: The Electric Vehicle Public Key Infrastructure Consortium (EVPKI Consortium) is excited announce the launch of our Production CTL that includes multiple PKI Certificate Authorities such as DigiCert, Hubject, Irdeto, ISS, and even OEMs General Motors and Tesla. This allows the testing of our interoperability model for PKI using our EVPKI production testing platform.

This allows the testing of our interoperability model for PKI using our EVPKI production testing platform.

headline: Legendary Short Seller Jim Chanos Just Closed His MSTR Trade—And Here's Why That Matters
summary: Veteran short seller Jim Chanos disclosed on Nov. 8 that his firm exited its hedged trade on Strategy (NASDAQ:MSTR), unwinding a position that had been closely watched by cryptocurrency and equity market participants. The disclosure came via X after what Chanos described as "some inquiries" about the status of the trade. Chanos & Co closed out their position on Nov. 6, ending a strategic bet that centered on the relationship between Strategy's stock price and its substantial Bitcoin holdings. Do

headline: MagneRide Suspension Revolutionizes Versatility Across All Segments and Power Sources
summary: PARIS, November 26, 2025--As an advanced suspension system, MagneRide stands out for its ability to adapt instantaneously. The fourth generation of MagneRide has redefined and proved its universal applicability across all passenger vehicle segments, from sedans and SUVs to high-performance cars, from gasoline to new energy vehicles.

headline: Tesla struggles to course correct from sales skid
summary: (Reuters) -Tesla CEO Elon Musk has spent much of this year focused on the carmaker’s robotics pursuits and winning shareholder approval for his freshly minted $1 trillion pay package.  In the meantime, the outlook for Tesla's main business – selling cars – is darkening.  The electric-vehicle maker's sales fell 48.5% across Europe in October versus the same month last year, according to data released by the European Automobile Manufacturers' Association on Tuesday. ‌For the year, its sales are down about 30% in the region, while industrywide EV sales jumped 26%.

The electric-vehicle maker's sales fell 48.5% across Europe in October versus the same month last year, according to data released by the European Automobile Manufacturers' Association on Tuesday. ‌For the year, its sales are down about 30% in the region, while industrywide EV sales jumped 26%.

headline: What Catalysts Are Changing the Narrative for GM Amid Analyst Optimism and Market Shifts
summary: The Fair Value Price Target for General Motors stock has seen a slight increase, moving from $73.15 to $74.15 per share. This change comes as a wave of analyst optimism follows the company’s robust quarterly performance and improved industry conditions. These factors have prompted upward revisions to price expectations. Stay tuned to learn how you can stay on top of future shifts in the evolving story behind General Motors stock. Stay updated as the Fair Value for General Motors shifts by...

headline: General Motors (GM) Is Up 7.1% After Q3 Delivery Jump and Supply Chain Shift Plans
summary: General Motors recently reported an 8% year-over-year increase in Q3 vehicle deliveries, raised its full-year outlook, and outlined plans to shift supplier sourcing away from China by 2027 to boost supply chain resilience and secure eligibility for U.S. tax credits. GM’s fleet and commercial business saw OnStar subscriptions surge over 50% to 1.6 million, underscoring the growing potential of digital services as a higher-margin revenue stream. We’ll explore how GM’s move to diversify its...
